select member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName,member_password as memberPassword,phone_number as phoneNumber,email as email,file_saved_name as fileSavedName from member, upload_file where member_id=#{memberId} and file_code=#{memberId} and file_status='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MODIFIER=#{memberId} , MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE , MEMBER_STATUS='N' WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PASSWORD , MEMBER_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE_NUMBER , WRITER , WRITE_DATE , MODIFIER , MODIFY_DATE , MEMBER_STATUS) VALUES (#{memberId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{memberPassword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{memberName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{phoneNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , NULL , SYSDATE , NULL , NULL , 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_PASSWORD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND MEMBER_STATUS='Y'

SELECT B.*, Dc.Detail_Cd_Name FROM (SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY Trv.Travel_Id ORDER BY Trvde.Travel_Date) AS rn, TRV.TRAVEL_TITLE,TRVDE.Place_Id, TRV.TRAVEL_START, TRV.TRAVEL_END, TRV.VIEW_CNT, TRV.SHARE_CNT FROM Travel TRV, TRAVEL_DETAIL TRVDE WHERE TRV.TRAVEL_ID = Trvde.Travel_Id AND TRV.WRITER = #{memberId}) A WHERE A.RN = 1 ) B, PLACE PLC, DETAIL_CODE DC WHERE B.PLACE_ID = PLC.PLACE_ID AND PLC.CATEGORY = DC.DETAIL_CD_ID

SELECT COUNT(CNT) FROM (SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY Trv.Travel_Id ORDER BY Trvde.Travel_Date) AS rn , COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY Trv.Travel_Id) AS CNT , TRV.TRAVEL_TITLE,TRVDE.Place_Id, TRV.TRAVEL_START , TRV.TRAVEL_END, TRV.VIEW_CNT , TRV.SHARE_CNT FROM Travel TRV, TRAVEL_DETAIL TRVDE WHERE TRV.TRAVEL_ID = Trvde.Travel_Id AND TRV.WRITER = #{memberId}) A WHERE A.RN = 1 ) B, PLACE PLC, DETAIL_CODE DC WHERE B.PLACE_ID = PLC.PLACE_ID AND PLC.CATEGORY = DC.DETAIL_CD_ID
